meanings.definition: toxicologists: experts who study the effects of toxic substances on living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The toxicologists conducted research on how harmful chemicals affect animals.
meanings.sent2: The toxicologists presented their findings on the impact of poisons on plants.
meanings.sent3: The toxicologists joked that they were like detectives investigating dangerous compounds.
meanings.sent4: In the world of science, toxicologists are the guardians against invisible dangers.
meanings.sent5: The work of toxicologists is crucial in safeguarding the environment from harmful pollutants.
